Text: Is having major problems with my external harddisc. That's why it's ben so long since my last post!
Thanks for the music. Hope you get your issues sorted out and have a back up, I learnt the hard way!

I'm with dank_vapours. Scary shit when you lose a whole load of gear. I now have 4 X 2tb drives and looking at 4tb drives. Better safe than sorry.
Still, as always, many thanks. Your efforts are appreciated.
Be well. T.
